title: Charm Person
content:
Charm Person Level 1 Enchantment Spell Charm a humanoid to prevent it from attacking you. You gain Advantage on Charisma Checks in dialogue. Enemies have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed. 10 turns Condition ends early if you or an ally hurts the target. In higher difficulty modes, the target might accuse you of enchanting them. 18mWIS Save Action Level 1 Spell Slot
